scripts.check: pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-runtime-api check && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-runtime check && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-electron-app check && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-keystone-ui check
scripts.lint: pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-keystone-ui lint && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-runtime lint && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-runtime-api lint && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-electron-app lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-runtime-api lint:fix && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-runtime lint:fix && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-electron-app lint:fix && pnpm run --prefix=gmcl-keystone-ui lint:fix
